name: Seasons
description:
Seasons is a puzzle platformer where you can change the seasons as you see fit to solve puzzles.

This game was made in under 5 days as a part of the GameDevHQ Community Jam #2. Any feedback is appreciated.

CREDITS
  • SFXs, Programming, Level Design & Artwork by me
  • Background Music provided by dl-sounds.com
  • Font (Pixelboy)
TOOLS
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
HOW TO PLAY Move: A/D Jump: Space Use: E

You can play the game on your browser at the top or download the zip file and open the .exe file. Enjoy!
